channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I tried to build a $550 rig to beat this $379 Machenike Ryzen 7 8745HS Mini PC — and I was unsuccessful
item.description: No other deal touches this Machenike AI mini PC for value - and it boasts an AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS with 16GB of high-speed RAM and a 512GB M.2 SSD.

item.title: Test du Hisense 55E7Q Pro : un téléviseur QLED 144 Hz accessible très fluide et réactif
item.description: Le Hisense 55E7Q Pro est un téléviseur QLED 4K de 55 pouces d'entrée de gamme qui vise à offrir une expérience fluide et polyvalente dans un format compact et abordable. Nous l’avons testé pour voir ce qu’il valait.

item.title: The 7 top space and defense tech startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the space and defense tech Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: Chelsea vs Aston Villa live streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 clash from anywhere in the world
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Chelsea vs Aston Villa in the Premier League this Saturday from anywhere in the world.

item.title: So you got a video doorbell or security camera for Christmas – what should you do now?
item.description: Hints and tips about how to get the most out of your new property-protecting present.

item.title: I'm tempted by the iPhone 17, but there are 3 reasons why I won't be upgrading just yet
item.description: I'm tempted by the iPhone 17, but it's still not compelling enough for me to swap out my current iPhone.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Sunday, December 28 (game #665)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Sunday, December 28 (game #931)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Sunday, December 28 (game #1434)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: I tried to build a PC to beat this $440 Core i9-12900H laptop and failed miserably — this is truly the best PC deal of 2025
item.description: If you don't mind an obscure Chinese brand, the Hasee X5 15.6 laptop is better than any PC in this price range

item.title: Chez Amazon, ce disque dur externe Western Digital perd 20 % de son prix et rend vos données inviolables
item.description: Pour stocker toutes vos données sans aucun problème, ce Western Digital emporte 5 To, mais aussi un logiciel de sauvegarde automatique. Chez Amazon, il perd 20 % de son prix et chute à 136,70 euros.

item.title: 10 storage technologies that want to replace hard drives
item.description: From enterprise flash to experimental archival media, these are ten technologies looking to replace traditional hard drives... one day.

item.title: The 34 best shows of 2025: TechRadar's top TV picks on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more
item.description: 2025 has been jam-packed with top-tier TV shows – here are TechRadar's favorite ones of the last 12 months.

item.title: ‘Last Airbender’ Fans Will Fight to See Their ‘Avatar’ in Theaters
item.description: Longtime fans of the Nickelodeon show aren't just letting Paramount punt the franchise's first animated movie out of theaters.
